summary: "The Babadook" is a 2014 Australian scary movie by Jennifer Kent. It's about a mom and her son who live in a house with a scary monster. Essie Davis and Noah Wiseman star. Kent wrote the story to explore being a parent, sadness, and fear of losing your mind. The movie was mostly funded by the Australian government and some crowdfunding. It was filmed in Adelaide, and the monster was made using old-school special effects. Though it didn't do well in Australia, it became popular worldwide, making $10 million. People liked the actors, the monster, and the story. It's now a cult classic and an internet meme.
title: The Babadook
